text: Thank you for making my doggyâ€™s day with the complimentary puppuccino. He absolutely loved it! The decor is beautiful, and the air-conditioned indoor space is wonderfully cool. Highly recommended as a post-walk treat after a visit to Bird Paradise.
Fast friendly service and delicious matcha! Convenient location right outside bird paradise.
Standard Starbucks fare. Good breakfast deals at $8.80 for a tall black & sandwich

Located at Mandai Wildlife West Deck level 2. Next to Forest Stream Trail and facing Bird Paradise entrance, opposite Pavilion Banana Leaf restaurant and Membership Experience.
Enter was well greeted by the manager(white long sleeve shirt) with a big smile. We found a table indoors around 7 tables and there's outdoor tables too.
We tried Matcha Soymilk Latte hot and ice version. The hot version is rich in Matcha and the ice version is good which my friend commented  as the weather is ðŸŒž.  As for the Matcha Burnt Cheesecake is good too strong Matcha taste. There's a small miscommunication between me and tge Cashier maybe my voice is soft so she can't hear me clearly, and she just charged me one Matcha Burnt Cheesecake so I thought I have 2 Cheesecake and the manager(sorry, never take note of his name), he is kind enough to serve us another piece of Matcha Cheesecake and told us can proceed to make payment after the long queue. Is very thoughtful of him of serving us the cheesecake first.
Well maintained, quick service and quality food. You get a nice view outside. Parents can relax and keep an eye on the children playing as well. Ambience is good and positive.
